sentences.en: An ancient Sanskrit saying says, woman is the home and the home is the basis of society. It is as we build our homes that we can build our country.
sentences.cn: 一个古梵文谚语说，女人是家而家是社会的基础就像我们能建设自己的家园我们才能建设我们的国家。

sentences.en: Grammatically, the Sanskrit paradigm exemplifies the concept of radical.
sentences.cn: 从语法的观点看, 梵语的变格范例明确了词根的概念.

sentences.en: He has Sanskrit at the tips of his fingers.
Here Sanskrit is instructive precisely because it has preserved all the Indo - Europeans's features.
sentences.cn: 梵语在这里之所以富有教益,就因为它保存了印欧语的全部分.

sentences.en: Mahayana literature was written mostly in Sanskrit and mixed Sanskrit.
sentences.cn: 这些大乘佛教的文献都是用梵文与混合梵文写程.

sentences.en: Most of these new sermons were recorded in literary Sanskrit rather than in vernacular language.
sentences.cn: 这些新的布道稿本大部分是用书面梵语而不是方言记载的。

sentences.en: Mr Sharma lit incense and chanted Sanskrit mantras.
sentences.cn: 夏尔马先生点上香，念起梵文咒语。

sentences.en: On the stone tablet are inscribed words in Sanskrit.
sentences.cn: 这块碑石上刻的是梵文.

sentences.en: Sanskrit is related very closely to Latin, Greek, and the Germanic and Celtic languages.
sentences.cn: 梵语和拉丁语、希腊语、日耳曼和凯尔特语是联系密切的同源语言。

sentences.en: Sanskrit verses used in the Vedic sacrifice are known as mantras.
sentences.cn: 吠陀祭礼所使用的咒语韵文是大家所知的咒语.

sentences.en: The etymological closeness of the Sanskrit and English words is striking.
sentences.cn: 梵语和英语的词源的连结性是如此地惊人.

sentences.en: The word YOGA comes from the Sanskrit language and means union.
sentences.cn: “瑜珈”这个词源自梵语,意为“合一”.

sentences.en: There has also been reciprocal influence between Sanskrit and the Dravidian languages.
sentences.cn: 梵语和德拉威语也是相互影响.

sentences.en: These three forms are local pronunciations of this Sanskrit name.
sentences.cn: 这个名字的当地梵语发音拥有三种形式.

sentences.en: They got the name from Persian who in turn got it from Sanskrit, from the Indians themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们从波斯人那里得知的名字，而波斯人是依次从梵文、从印第安人他们自己得知的名字。

sentences.en: They've got this design of dolphins and our names engraved in Sanskrit.
sentences.cn: 那上面有海豚的设计,有梵语刻的名字.

sentences.en: This scripture was written in Sanskrit and is very hard to understand.
sentences.cn: 这本经籍是用梵文写的,很难读懂.
